overview: Pierre de la Fortune is the founder and Chief Executive Officer of Money Blitz Television. The phrase “chatroom funding” was coined by Pierre de la Fortune (on Feb 9, 2012 at 10:53 a.m.) when he combined live streaming video conferences with equity financing. Chatroom funding is a business model for entrepreneurs and investors looking to make money in real-time, with on-line video, audio, and instant text messaging. Pierre de la Fortune also is the Chairman of the Board for the parent holding company De La Fortune Inc.
